description:
Calibre 7.25 open-source ebook management software is now available for download with support for importing KFX files from 2024 Kindle devices that use the MTP protocol.

The post Calibre 7.25 Adds Support for Importing KFX Files from 2024 Kindle Devices via MTP appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Calibre 7.25 Adds Support for Importing KFX Files from 2024 Kindle Devices via MTP
